Title: Port Business Advertisement
Text: Jinzhou is a fortress city on the southeastern border of Huanglong. It is the first land-based port for all foreign ships entering the nation. Foreign personnel and goods must be inspected and offloaded at Port Gunchao. Port Gunchao features a well-established container management system, along with large-scale berthing facilities. It is a comprehensive main hub port and container trunk port with the highest throughput out of any port in Huanglong. Currently, Port Gunchao has reached long-term strategic partnerships with Lollo Logistics and the Pioneer Association. We welcome business cooperation of any form.    Office of Commerce, Port Gunchao
